allow: Bash(# Kill any running instance pkill -f ntfy-macos || true # Try to reset TCC \(Transparency, Consent, and Control\) database entry # This requires knowing the bundle ID echo ""Bundle ID: com.laurentftech.ntfy-macos"" # Check if the app is in any notification center database sqlite3 ~/Library/Preferences/com.apple.ncprefs.plist ""SELECT * FROM app_info WHERE bundle_id LIKE ''%ntfy%'';"" || echo ""Not a sqlite db or no matches"" # List notification settings defaults read com.apple.ncprefs)

Bash(curl -s -H "Authorization: Bearer tk_23w3wik0oeqe7xmjvp0hj8gx7hfqa" -H "Title: Ouvre Google" -H "Actions: view, Ouvrir Google, https://google.com" -d "Notification avec bouton action" https://headscale.tadpole-liberty.ts.net/test)
Bash(curl -s -H "Authorization: Bearer tk_23w3wik0oeqe7xmjvp0hj8gx7hfqa" -H "Title: Bouton Config" -d "Clique sur Ouvrir GitHub!" https://headscale.tadpole-liberty.ts.net/test)
Bash(curl -s -H "Authorization: Bearer tk_23w3wik0oeqe7xmjvp0hj8gx7hfqa" -H "Title: Test icône HA" -d "Notification avec icône Home Assistant" https://headscale.tadpole-liberty.ts.net/test)
